alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 08 at 4:00PM MST until August 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... East central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 500 PM MST. * At 359 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 14 miles west of Chui-Chu to near Gila Bend Auxiliary Field to 7 miles southeast of Dateland, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 67 and 156. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 36. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 131. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Maricopa, Sentinel, Cotton Center, Kaka, Dateland, Sonoran National Monument, Mobile and Ak-Chin Village. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
